# VoidToForm
**VoidToForm** is a thoughtfully crafted single-page portfolio that turns blank space into a compelling digital narrative. It merges design precision, clean code, and creative storytelling to present projects in a minimalist yet expressive way ‚Äî where every element has intent and every detail has meaning. ‚ú®

[![Github License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/UjjwalSaini07/VoidToForm)](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/VoidToForm/blob/main/LICENSE)
[![Info](https://img.shields.io/badge/Project-Info-blue?style=flat&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/VoidToForm/blob/main/README.md)
[![Generic badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Owner-@Ujjwal-<COLOR>.svg)](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/VoidToForm)
[![GitHub stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/UjjwalSaini07/VoidToForm?style=social&label=Star&maxAge=2592100)](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/VoidToForm)
[![Github Release](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/UjjwalSaini07/VoidToForm)](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/VoidToForm)

# Key Features üöÄ

- **Single-Page Experience** ‚Äì Seamless scroll-based navigation for a focused, elegant presentation
- **Modular Design** ‚Äì Easily customizable layout and components to match your personal brand
- **Lightweight & Fast** ‚Äì Optimized for performance with minimal dependencies
- **Fully Responsive** ‚Äì Looks great on all devices, from mobile to desktop
- **Minimalist Aesthetic** ‚Äì Clean typography, balanced whitespace, and subtle animations
- **Built for Creators** ‚Äì Perfect for developers, designers, or anyone with work worth showing
- **Integrated Socials & Contact** ‚Äì Quick ways for visitors to connect or follow your work
- **Domain-Ready** ‚Äì Easy to deploy on GitHub Pages, Vercel, or Netlify
- **Content-First Structure** ‚Äì Emphasizes storytelling, clarity, and visual hierarchy
- **Open Source** ‚Äì Freely available to adapt, remix, or contribute

## Demo üñ•Ô∏è
You can visit the live site here - https://voidbyujjwal.vercel.app/

## Technologies Used üë®üèª‚Äçüíª
- **Typescript** ‚Äì A strongly-typed superset of JavaScript that enhances the development of fast and scalable web applications.
- **Tailwind CSS** ‚Äì A utility-first CSS framework for efficient and responsive styling.
- **JavaScript** ‚Äì A versatile programming language for building fast, dynamic, and scalable web applications.
- **ShadCN** ‚Äì Used for beautifully designed, responsive components.

## Installation üõ†Ô∏è
- First Read this [License](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/VoidToForm/blob/main/LICENSE) & their terms then proceed.
- Star the [Repository](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/VoidToForm)
- Clone the repository:
```bash
  git clone https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/VoidToForm.git
```
- Install the necessary dependencies:
```bash
  pnpm install
```

## Usage üñ•Ô∏è
- Start the development server
```bash
   pnpm run dev
 ```
- Open your browser and navigate to http://localhost:3000 to view the localhost website

- [@Ujjwal Saini](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07)
